title: CompareRemit, the Leading Remittance Comparison Site, Announces Its New Mobile App with the First Remittance App for Apple Watch
text:
Money transfer comparison site, CompareRemit.com, releases first remittance app for Apple Watch, giving users accessibility to real-time exchange rates right on their wrist.
SANTA CLARA, Calif. (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
CompareRemit.com, the innovative online platform for comparing remittance services, recently introduced a new way to find the best exchange rate for sending money to India with the launch of its CompareRemit app for Apple Watch. Developed to give users even more simplicity when it comes to finding the best exchange rate, the CompareRemit app for Apple Watch allows wearers to find the best exchange rate and receive exchange rate notifications all at the tap of their wrist.
“We are proud to bring the first ever remittance app for Apple Watch,” said CompareRemit CEO and President Rajeev Shrivastava. “CompareRemit is changing the game of remittance. As remittance growth continues to skyrocket, it is important that we provide our users with the best technological initiatives for sending money abroad, and this means giving users access to all of CompareRemit’s features via personal devices.”
The CompareRemit app for Apple Watch gives users the flexibility of accessing exchange rates from all the money transfer companies right on their watch. With the Apple Watch app, users can also set exchange rate alert notifications so they never miss a great exchange rate.
With the launch of the CompareRemit app for Apple Watch, CompreRemit also released an update for its iPhone and Android mobile app, offering even more helpful features. Users can now calculate currency conversions, read user reviews about the remittance companies, access exclusive coupons and promotions, set alerts that notify when the exchange rate reaches a specified amount, and complete their transaction to send money abroad in addition to showing the exchange rates in real-time.
CompareRemit is a unique platform that not only provides users a way to find the best exchange rate for sending money to India, but also gives remittance service providers a niche marketplace for reaching out to remittance service seekers. CompareRemit creates a marketplace that connects users and providers, helping each more easily find the service or the traffic it intends to locate.
Link to the Apps:
Apple App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id965179864
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.path2usa.compareremit.android.app
About CompareRemit.com:
CompareRemit.com is a breakthrough online platform for comparing remittance services and sending money to India. Created by the same company known for developing invaluable services to the Indian immigrant community through other platforms such as Path2usa, Trackitt, and LawBench, CompareRemit is dedicated to providing a convenient online platform for helping its users find the best way to send money to India.
